This card is amazing. Here's how an experienced player would use it.  
Turn one: [Llanowar Elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Llanowar Elves)  
Turn Two: Fyndhorn Brownie  
Turn Three: Pay three, tap the brownie, untap the brownie.  
Clean and simple.
